LanguageData.LSS.label: Life Support System
LanguageData.LSS.description: An advanced development of the Y-17 medical complex, created to support the life of seriously wounded soldiers in field conditions. The suit is equipped with an autonomous stabilization system, built-in analgesics and a "forced evacuation" function - because sometimes a soldier is too stubborn to admit that it's time for him to go to the morgue..
LanguageData.RadAwayConsumed.label: Rad Away
LanguageData.RegenGasExposure.label: Regen Gas
LanguageData.RegenGasExposure.description: Aftereffects of exposure to tox gas, a poisonous chemical gas. It burns the lungs and eyes, causing a temporary shortness of breath and reduction in sight. Continued exposure to tox gas results in toxic buildup and eventually death.
LanguageData.RegenGasExposure.stages.0.label: side effect
LanguageData.RegenGasExposure.stages.1.label: regeneration
